Compatible (tested) with iOS 8 to 12

discreetVoiceMemos gives you the way to Make in one shot Discreet and Secretive the VoiceMemos App just disabling some Intrusive Features like:

- The View of the Waveform in the LockScreen!

- The View of the Red StatusBar and the Start Sound when Recording!

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)

Configure options from Settings.


Credits: Thanks @sinfool for the idea/tip in making this Tweak.
